Playground
Interface BiDimensional

All Known Subinterfaces:
AgentInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
Agent, Food, NutriceResource, ProkaryotesAgent, Water, Worm
public interface BiDimensional

Describes an object that can "run" at a 2D Space. Has Width and Height, and it's 2D position Coordinates. BiDimensional also holds the four signs of the horizon as signs of a BiDimensional World.

Author:
Pappas Evangelos - papas.evagelos@gmail.com - BagosGiAr
